titles: The bird in a cage A comedie. As it hath beene presented at the Phœnix in Drury-Lane. The author Iames Shirley, servant to Her Majesty.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed by B. Alsop. and T. Fawcet. for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop neere Furnivals-Inne Gate, in Holborne,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
